required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Post-market, Observational Registry With the easyEndoTM Universal Linear Cutting Stapler in Laparoscopic Bariatric Surgery
clinical_study.official_title: A Post-market, Observational Registry With the easyEndoTM Universal Linear Cutting Stapler in Laparoscopic Bariatric Surgery

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this observational registry is to evaluate the safety and performance of the easyEndoTM Universal Linear Cutting Stapler and reloads from Ezisurg Medical when used to create anastomoses during laparoscopic bariatric surgery. The goal of the study will be achieved by assessing the device performance and by reporting of peri- and postoperative complications in a prospectively maintained database.

primary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the safety of the easyEndoTM Universal Linear Cutting Stapler and reloads (Ezisurg Medical) in laparoscopic bariatric surgery.
primary_outcome.description: Conversion rate, number of re-interventions and number of participants with (serious) adverse events ≥ grade II Clavien-Dindo.

primary_outcome.measure: To evaluate the safety of the easyEndoTM Universal Linear Cutting Stapler and reloads (Ezisurg Medical) in laparoscopic bariatric surgery.
primary_outcome.description: Number of re-interventions and number of participants with (serious) adverse events ≥ grade II Clavien-Dindo.

primary_outcome.description: Number of re-interventions and number of participants with (serious) adverse events ≥ grade II Clavien-Dindo.

secondary_outcome.description: Number of procedures with technical success defined as bariatric surgery as intended, without technical difficulties and without conversion to open laparotomy.
Assessment of device performance (e.g. sharpness of the blade, staple-line formation, etc.).

arm_group.arm_group_label: Obese patients eligible for laparoscopic bariatric surgery

intervention.intervention_name: easyEndoTM Universal Linear Cutting Stapler and reloads (Ezisurg Medical)
intervention.description: Investigational device: easyEndoTM Universal Linear Cutting Stapler and reloads (Ezisurg Medical). Device for creation of anastomoses during laparoscopic bariatric surgery, manufactured by Ezisurg Medical.
intervention.arm_group_label: Obese patients eligible for laparoscopic bariatric surgery

study_pop.textblock: Obese patients eligible for laparoscopic bariatric surgery. This registry will collect data from 200 laparoscopic bariatric procedures in which anastomoses are created with the easyEndoTM Universal Linear Cutting Stapler and reloads (Ezisurg Medical).

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patient ≥ 18 years of age at registry entry.
- Patient and investigator signed and dated the informed consent form prior to the index-procedure.
- Patient has a BMI ≥ 35 kg/m2, with one or more related co-morbidities.
- Patient has a BMI ≥ 40 kg/m2.
- Patient is eligible for laparoscopic bariatric surgery.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patient is unable / unwilling to provide informed consent.
- Patient has a history of bariatric surgery.
- Patient is unable to comply with the registry protocol or proposed follow-up visits.
- Patient has a contra-indication for laparoscopic bariatric surgery.
